attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A bill that will stop people who are payed from the public purse being affiliated to any masonic lodge or being involved in any legal judgments that involves a mason being taken to court, or the hiring of any person going for jobs in the public sector.as most are not elected and only get their top  jobs because of a school and a hand shake

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
